languages.text: "Говорил я вам! То не просто Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}, а сам{rt_mf||а} промазанни{rt_mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора! Благодетель{rt_mf||ница}!"
languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Говорил я вам! То не просто Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, а сам{mf||а} промазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора! Благодетель{mf||ница}!"

languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

languages.text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
languages.original_text: "Говорил я вам! То не просто Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}, а сам{rt_mf||а} промазанни{rt_mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора! Благодетель{rt_mf||ница}!"

traits.locale_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s no ordinary Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
"I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s no ordinary Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
"I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s no ordinary Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
"I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s no ordinary Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
"I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"
"I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

languages.text: “我就说吧！那位大人和别的贵族根本不一样！{rt_mf|他|她}是神皇的神选者！是救世主！”
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: “我就说吧！那位大人和别的贵族根本不一样！{rt_mf|他|她}是神皇的神选者！是救世主！”

languages.text: «¡Os lo había dicho! No es un{rt_mf| Señor Celestial|a Señora Celestial} cualquiera, ¡es un{rt_mf||a} ungid{rt_mf|o|a} del Emperador, un{rt_mf||a} benefactor{rt_mf||a}!».
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Os lo había dicho! No es un{rt_mf| Señor Celestial|a Señora Celestial} cualquiera, ¡es un{rt_mf||a} ungid{rt_mf|o|a} del Emperador, un{rt_mf||a} benefactor{rt_mf||a}!».

languages.text: "Söylemiştim size! O herhangi bir Semavi {rt_mf|Lord|Leydi} değil, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışlarından biri! hayırsever biri!"
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: "Söylemiştim size! O herhangi bir Semavi {rt_mf|Lord|Leydi} değil, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışlarından biri! hayırsever biri!"

languages.text: 「言っただろう！天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}とは違って、神帝陛下の後継者なんだ！慈善家なんだ！」
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: 「言っただろう！天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}とは違って、神帝陛下の後継者なんだ！慈善家なんだ！」

languages.text: « Je vous l'avais dit ! {rt_mf|Il|Elle} n'est pas n'importe {rt_mf|quel Seigneur|quelle Seigneure} Céleste, mais l'{rt_mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu ! {rt_mf|Un bienfaiteur|Une bienfaitrice} ! »
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous l'avais dit ! {rt_mf|Il|Elle} n'est pas n'importe {rt_mf|quel Seigneur|quelle Seigneure} Céleste, mais l'{rt_mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu ! {rt_mf|Un bienfaiteur|Une bienfaitrice} ! »

languages.text: "Ich habe es Euch doch gesagt! {rt_mf|Er|Sie} ist {rt_mf|kein gewöhnlicher himmlischer Herr|keine gewöhnliche himmlische Herrin}, sondern {rt_mf|einer|eine} der Gesalbten des Gottimperators! {rt_mf|Ein Wohltäter|Eine Wohltäterin}!"
languages.original_text: "I told you! {rt_mf|He|She}'s not just any Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}, but one of the God-Emperor's anointed! A benefactor!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es Euch doch gesagt! {rt_mf|Er|Sie} ist {rt_mf|kein gewöhnlicher himmlischer Herr|keine gewöhnliche himmlische Herrin}, sondern {rt_mf|einer|eine} der Gesalbten des Gottimperators! {rt_mf|Ein Wohltäter|Eine Wohltäterin}!"
